description.p: A benign slime altered by magic and made into a familiar. These slimes come in a variety of colors and are intensely curious.

setters.set: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8
blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

description.p: The slime has advantage on Charisma (Performance) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks.

sheet.description: The slime has advantage on Charisma (Performance) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks.

description.p: The slime can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

sheet.description: The slime can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

description.p: The slime is adorable. It can cast charm person once per day without material components.

sheet.description: The slime is adorable. It can cast charm person once per day without material components.

description.p: When the slime is hit by a melee attack, the attacker must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or their weapon becomes stuck in the slime. The weapon can be wrenched out by using an action to make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the weapon on a success. All weapons stuck in the slime can be retrieved once the slime is slain.
